description:
From surf to SUP, you’re good to play in the sun as long as you like in this functional rashguard. Cap sleeves, a half-zip and 4-way stretch add style and comfort.

  • Nylon and spandex fabric has 4-way stretch
  • UPF 50+ for maximum UV protection
  • Cap sleeves and adjustable side shirring
  • Half-zip lets you adjust coverage and cool down at will
name: Carve Designs Dawson Short Sleeve Rashguard - Women's
